excerpt: "Amazon Web Services (AWS) has named Softchoice (TSX: SFTC) as the Canada 2022 AWS Solution Provider Partner of the Year. The award is based on Softchoice’s customer and revenue growth for AWS solutions and recognizes the company’s capabilities to help organizations succeed with AWS."
